title: Link Cleaner PWA can help you quickly clean links on any device
content:
Web links can often be annoying to share with other people, with tracking code and other unnecessarily variables often added to the end by apps or referring websites. It’s usually easy enough to remove the extra junk on a desktop computer, but the process can be more difficult and time-consuming on mobile, since text selection

The post Link Cleaner PWA can help you quickly clean links on any device appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Link Cleaner is a Progressive Web App that can remove tracking variables and other junk from web links in one click.
